title: Bear Out
description: A vacation in the Arctic brings two pizzly bears closer to their polar bear mate.The final saga of Bear with Me and Unbearable.Pizzly bears Christopher and Robin have come to realize how lucky they are to have found their mate, polar bear shifter Theodore. When Theo surprises them with a vacation to the Norwegian Arctic, they’re determined to show him their gratitude and make this a trip to remember.Bears just want to have fun, after all…
author: Jade Buchanan
